rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Recently, there have been an increasing
number of incidents where people are
attacked by monsters while salvaging, mo.

rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0003
rows.name:
It's harder to move in the Cloud
Sea than on land, so if you're
attacked, you're a goner, mo.

rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0004
rows.name:
The number of salvagers who are scared by
the rumors and don't want to dive into the
Cloud Sea is rapidly increasing, mo.

rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Hiyokkoo, for one, doesn't want
to dive in, so I'm just watching
the scenery from here, mo.

rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0006
rows.name:
If only I could hire an
escort... then I could summon
the courage to dive, mo.

rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0007
rows.name: Really, mo? You'll protect us, mo?

rows.label: tlk42410111_05_msg0008
rows.name:
That's wonderful, mo! I'm
counting on you, mo!
